Waitangi Tribunal accepts urgency for claim against scrapping of Māori Health Authority, criticises ‘problematic’ government approach https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/waitangi-tribunal-accepts-urgency-for-claim-against-scrapping-of-maori-health-authority-criticises-problematic-government-approach/3X3UMWGI3FA4NN5S3VAV4JZETY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/waitangi-tribunal-accepts-urgency-for-claim-against-scrapping-of-maori-health-authority-criticises-problematic-government-approach/3X3UMWGI3FA4NN5S3VAV4JZETY/ Nicholas JonesThe decision adds to growing tension surrounding government policy affecting Māori. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 23:42:36 +0000 National Urban Māori Authority chairwoman Lady Tureiti Moxon, one of the parties asking for an urgent Waitangi Tribunal claim into the disestablishment of Te Aka Whai Ora (the Māori Health Authority).
